title: Where can I get Emiway Bantai - Bharosa song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bharosa song lyrics Bharosa is a freshly released Hindi rap song by Emiway Bantai. The artist is filmed in a music video and also inked down the rap lyrics for this track.
